requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.0.04 or equivalent.
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 710 or equivalent.
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated GPU not required.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.0.04 LTS
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated GPU not required.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Mojave or higher.
  • Processor: Intel Core i57260U or higher.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD integrated graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated GPU not required.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Monterey
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple Silicon M1
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated GPU not required.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Release 20H2 or higher.
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 710 or equivalent.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated GPU not required.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 or equivalent.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated GPU not required.
